20 #include "werdit.h"
21 
22 /**********************************************************************
23  * make_pseudo_word
24  *
25  * Make all the blobs inside a selection into a single word.
26  * The returned PAGE_RES_IT* it points to the new word. After use, call
27  * it->DeleteCurrentWord() to delete the fake word, and then
28  * delete it to get rid of the iterator itself.
29  **********************************************************************/
30 
31 PAGE_RES_IT* make_pseudo_word(PAGE_RES* page_res, const TBOX& selection_box) {
32  PAGE_RES_IT pr_it(page_res);
33  C_BLOB_LIST new_blobs; // list of gathered blobs
34  C_BLOB_IT new_blob_it = &new_blobs; // iterator
35 
36  for (WERD_RES* word_res = pr_it.word(); word_res != NULL;
37  word_res = pr_it.forward()) {
38  WERD* word = word_res->word;
39  if (word->bounding_box().overlap(selection_box)) {
40  C_BLOB_IT blob_it(word->cblob_list());
41  for (blob_it.mark_cycle_pt();
42  !blob_it.cycled_list(); blob_it.forward()) {
43  C_BLOB* blob = blob_it.data();
44  if (blob->bounding_box().overlap(selection_box)) {
45  new_blob_it.add_after_then_move(C_BLOB::deep_copy(blob));
46  }
47  }
48  if (!new_blobs.empty()) {
49  WERD* pseudo_word = new WERD(&new_blobs, 1, NULL);
50  word_res = pr_it.InsertSimpleCloneWord(*word_res, pseudo_word);
51  PAGE_RES_IT* it = new PAGE_RES_IT(page_res);
52  while (it->word() != word_res && it->word() != NULL) it->forward();
53  ASSERT_HOST(it->word() == word_res);
54  return it;
55  }
56  }
57  }
58  return NULL;
59 }
